commit.message:
expr.c (emit_block_move): If X is readonly emit CLOBBER for it.

	* expr.c (emit_block_move): If X is readonly emit CLOBBER for it.
	(clear_storage): Likewise, for OBJECT.

From-SVN: r46865

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+Thu Nov  8 18:00:55 2001  Richard Kenner  <kenner@vlsi1.ultra.nyu.edu>
+
+	* expr.c (emit_block_move): If X is readonly emit CLOBBER for it.
+	(clear_storage): Likewise, for OBJECT.
+
